text: 1:14-15 Dɨboboniba 6:3; Gumazir Dapaniba 13:4; Jeremaia 1:5; Galesia 1:15Egh nɨ bar akuegh navir amɨrizimɨn ikɨ. Eghtɨ a Godɨn damazimɨn ziar ekiam iniam, kamaghɨn amizɨ gumazamizir avɨriba an otoghamin dughiamɨn bar akuegham. Eghtɨ a wain ko dɨpar onganibar aman kogham. A uan amebamɨn navir averiamɨn aven ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ, Godɨn Duam bar a gizɨvagham.
